docs.lead_paragraph: Following is a first set of answers from Benjamin Weiser and Leslie Kaufman of The Times, who, along with a panel of experts, answered readers' questions about foster care from Nov. 7-12. In a series called "A History of Neglect" [Part 1 | Part 2 | Part 3], Ms. Kaufman and Mr. Weiser reported this week on New York City's foster care system.

headline.main: Answers About New York Foster Care, Part 1

docs.abstract: A first set of answers from Leslie Kaufman and Benjamin Weiser of The Times, along with a panel of foster care experts, about minority-run foster care agencies. Ms. Kaufman, Mr. Weiser and the experts are taking questions from readers this week.
docs.snippet: A first set of answers from Leslie Kaufman and Benjamin Weiser of The Times, along with a panel of foster care experts, about minority-run foster care agencies. Ms. Kaufman, Mr. Weiser and the experts are taking questions from readers this week.
